en-US.summary: Alexa will play blackjack with you.
en-US.name: blackjack
en-US.description: Alexa will play blackjack with you. It's a turn based game. Each turn players can ask for a card. If a player refuse a card he won't be able to ask another for the rest of the game. When no more player requests a card, players cards are summed. The winner is the player whose score is closest but less than 21.
